com.github.shynixn.blockball.api.business.service

Interface GameBungeeCordGameActionService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameBungeeCordGameActionServiceImpl

    public GameBungeeCordGameActionService

    Created by Shynixn 2018.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameBungeeCordGameActionService

        public GameBungeeCordGameActionService()

    • Method Detail

      • closeGame

        void closeGame(BungeeCordGame game)

        Closes the given game and all underlying resources.

      • leaveGame

        <P> void leaveGame(BungeeCordGame game,
                   P player)

        Lets the given player leave the given game. Does nothing if the player is not in the game.

        See Also:
        player, game

      • handle

        void handle(BungeeCordGame game,
            int ticks)

        Handles the game actions per tick. ticks parameter shows the amount of ticks 0 - 20 for each second.

        See Also:
        ticks
